description: ff. 54 (mutil., breaks off in the letter sīn; the last two leaves belong to the letter mīm). 265 x 183; 190 x 125 mm. 25 lin. 15th cen. - on the margins additions and corrections by the authorʼs hand. Brockelmann, GAL, II, 44 (no. 7); S II, 32.
author: Sakhāwī, Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān, 1427 or 8-1497
title: al-Maqāṣid al-ḥasanah fī bayān kathīr min al-aḥādīth al-mushtahirah ʻalá al-alsinah
creator: Sakhāwī, Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān, 1427 or 8-1497
subject: Hadith—Texts—Early works to 1800
member of collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
